name: Nanosaur 2 Free
description:
Same as the paid version, but with advertisements.

• Single or multiplayer modes!
• Game Controller support
• AirPlay support

You pilot a time traveling dinosaur from the future who's equipped with a jetpack and weaponry. Your goal is to gather weapons and other powerups and then blast your enemies out of the sky! There is a single-player Adventure mode, plus 3 multiplayer network modes!
